## Private Member Functions

### analyzePHINodes() {#aba072ccd2fb21f8e24bd71aadf70f3ff}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void PHIEliminationImpl::analyzePHINodes (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF)</>}>
analyzePHINodes - Gather information about the PHI nodes in here.

In particular, we want to map the number of uses of a virtual register which is used in a PHI node. We map that to the BB the vreg is coming from. This is used later to determine when the vreg is killed in the BB.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/phielimination-cpp/#l00089">89</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/phielimination-cpp">PHIElimination.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
